description: Bootstrap v3.2.0 ScrollSpy plugin implementation, providing scroll tracking and active link highlighting based on scroll position.

classes.name: ScrollSpy
classes.description: Class implementing scrollspy behavior, tracking scroll position and updating active navigation links.

methods.name: getScrollHeight
methods.description: Returns the total scrollable height of the scroll element.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Recalculates offsets and targets based on current DOM state.

methods.name: process
methods.description: Handles scroll event, determines which target is active based on scroll position.

methods.name: activate
methods.description: Activates a specific target, updating the active class on navigation links.
